articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: When we think of recurring characters in Peter Jackson film franchises, names like Frodo, Gandalf, Gollum and Sauron stand out. Add John, Paul, George and Ringo to that list. Following a five-Emmy-nomination haul for his Disney+ three-part docu The…
